name: di-authentication-account-redirect-page
description: Repo for single page which provides redirect functionality from 'old' account management URL to new one

scripts.build: npm run govuk-frontend-setup && rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && cp -R ./assets ./index.css ./index.css.map ./index.html ./dist
scripts.govuk-frontend-setup: npm run compile-css && npm run copy-js
scripts.compile-css: sass ./index.scss ./index.css && rm -rf assets && mkdir assets && cp -R ./node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/assets/images ./node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/assets/fonts ./assets
scripts.copy-js: rm -rf assets/js && mkdir assets/js && cp ./node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.js ./node_modules/govuk-frontend/govuk/all.js.map assets/js
